Miscellaneous

Visuals

The Pudding: a digital publication that explains ideas debated in culture with visual essays.
Information is Beautiful: a website that uses data visualization to tell stories and make complex information more accessible.

Music

NTS Radio: an online radio station with curated sets of artists and fans, with a focus on underground music.
Every Noise At Once: a map of 6291 music genres, with samples of each genre.
